sentences.en: A lorikeet, expertly balancing on a thin branch, stared.
sentences.cn: 小鹦鹉熟练的站在一条细树枝上盯着看.

sentences.en: Blake jumped in expertly; the boat dipped slightly under his weight.
sentences.cn: 布莱克很熟练地跳上了船，他的重量使小船微微向下沉了沉。

sentences.en: Distances and widths that appear equal are expertly varied.
sentences.cn: 距离和宽度看似相等的格局,实则千变万化,巧夺天工.

sentences.en: Expertly he zigzagged his way across the field, avoiding the deeper gullies.
sentences.cn: 他熟练地左一拐右一拐地绕过深沟，穿过了原野。

sentences.en: He now had an expertly detailed specification.
sentences.cn: 现在他有了精细的规格说明.

sentences.en: He tensed himself for the jump and landed expertly on the other side.
sentences.cn: 他绷紧身体跳起,然后娴熟地落在另一边.

sentences.en: If you’re a perfectionist, like me, you might especially be prone to not doing anything at all if you think you can’t do it expertly.
sentences.cn: 如果你是个像我一样的完美主义者，你认为你不能熟练地完成它，你就很可能什么都不做。

sentences.en: It is expertly designed, environmentally friendly , lightweight , and simple to operate.
sentences.cn: 产品外观设计小巧精美,绿色环保, 使用方便, 便于携带.

sentences.en: Make a new song to him; playing expertly with a loud noise.
sentences.cn: 应当向他唱新歌, 弹得巧妙,声音洪亮.

sentences.en: Papa seemed distracted, but he whirled her around the floor expertly.
sentences.cn: 爸爸有些心不在焉, 但他熟练地带着她在地板上旋转.

sentences.en: She shuffles cards expertly, all the guys stare in amazement.
sentences.cn: 她熟练地洗着牌, 爷们都看呆了.

sentences.en: Shopkeepers expertly rolled spices up in bay leaves.
sentences.cn: 店主熟练地将调料卷进月桂树叶里。

sentences.en: The acoustics of the room have been expertly planned.
sentences.cn: 这房间的音响效果设计得颇具匠心.

sentences.en: The nurse disrobed the elderly patient expertly.
sentences.cn: 护士熟练地脱去了较老病人的衣服。

sentences.en: The nurse dressed the wound expertly.
sentences.cn: 护士熟练地敷药包扎了伤口。

sentences.en: The puppets are expertly manipulated by Liz Walker.
sentences.cn: 利兹·沃克熟练地操纵着木偶。

sentences.en: The worker operated the machine expertly; we admired him greatly.
sentences.cn: 那位工人操纵机器很熟练, 我们对他很钦佩.

sentences.en: These expertly made golden carvings give an airy lightness to Thai buildings.
sentences.cn: 这种高超的黄金雕刻给泰国建筑赋予了一种鲜亮的色泽.
